forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.
